title: Following regulations shall be applicable for the low intensity development areas in the Vasai Virar City Municipal Corporation
clause_text: Following regulations shall be applicable for the low intensity development areas in the Vasai Virar City Municipal Corporation. The basic and total permissible FSI with DR / TDR on the plot shall be as under :-
